results: First line should end with a period, question mark, or exclamation point

'''# Header

<!-- BEGIN INCLUDE {filepath} '<!--start-here-->' '<!--end-here-->' -->

This must be included.

<!-- END INCLUDE -->
''',  # noqa: E501

'''# Header

<!-- BEGIN INCLUDE {filepath} '<!--\\tstart -->' '<!--\\tend -->' -->

This must be included.

<!-- END INCLUDE -->
''',  # noqa: E501

'''# Header

{%
  include-markdown "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mondeja/mkdocs-include-markdown-plugin/master/examples/basic/docs/included.md"
%}

After include.
''',  # noqa: E501

'''# Header

<!-- BEGIN INCLUDE https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mondeja/mkdocs-include-markdown-plugin/master/examples/basic/docs/included.md -->
Some ignored content.

<--start-->

Some included content.

<!-- END INCLUDE -->

After include.
''',  # noqa: E501
File is part of an implicit namespace package. Add an __init__.py?
explicitly concatenated string should be implicitly concatenated

'''1.  This is the first number line

1.  <!-- BEGIN INCLUDE {filepath} -->
    This content chunk contains code
''' + '    ' + '''
    ```
    This is my example
    It is a code block
    ```
''' + '    ' + '''
    With some text after it
''' + '    ' + '''
    <!-- END INCLUDE -->

1.  If everything works as expected this should be number 3
''',  # noqa: ISC003
